reviews.text: While our huge, over crowded  London airports have made travelling a hassle and unrelaxing with long walking distances and complicated/expensive pick up/drop off, Southend Airport totally bucks the trend. Simple processes, small queues, straightforward passport control and easy going staff have made travelling enjoyable again. you’d be surprised where they fly to, too! Don’t change what you do Southend! You are extremely popular with thousands of travellers!

Awful. Just received a letter to say I have a £100 parking fine for stopping at a zebra crossing to let a pedestrian past. Clearly opportunistic decisions have been made to con customers using the transport by not providing and drop off bays.

The biggest disappointment ever. We arrived at 1:30am at the airport and for our amusement the airport was closed. Apparently the airport is not open for the public from 00:30am till 3:30am. Great is it. So we had to stay outside for 2 hours in a lovely British breezy evening. Never again. Thank you for your time.

Small airport well connected to London while tracks are not being repaired, which unfortunately is all too common. You can still get here via Southend Central and take bus 7/8/9. Don't take taxi, they will rip you off. Very small selection of dining or shopping but you can get all you need here: food, sunscreen, beer and coffee. Plenty toilets. If it wasn't for the issues with rail tracks it would be 5 stars.
The airport closes at midnight, till 4AM. So if you have to wait for your flight overnight, they let you freeze outside, at the airport doors. Fascinating.
